invitation-answer: By now we've started sending out the official invitations that will indicate how many seats we have reserved in your honour. If however you have any more questions for us, please don't hesitate to contact us directly.
arrivalTime-question: When do I need to be at the venue?
arrivalTime-answer: Please be at the venu no later than 16:20. Late parties will not be permitted entrance until after the ceremony.
endTime-question: When is the appropriate time to leave?
endTime-answer: Please do not dine and ditch. We want to spend this evening together with you and take our time to chat. Stay with us for as long as you want.
parking-answer: Parking at the venue is extremely limited. We highly recommend commuting in groups or looking for a nearby place to stay. There is no official parking lot available which means that you'll have to park along the side of the road.
kids-answer: This will be a mainly adult only affair. The only kids attending are those who are part of the entourage and those requested. We won't be providing any babysitting services during the event either. We hope you understand, enjoy your night off.
date-question: Can I bring someone with me?
date-answer: As much as we love to have everyone celebrate with us, unfortunately we can only accomodate a limited number of guests. Please refer to the number of seats alloted for you. If your partner is invited their name is included on the formal invitation. We want to be surrounded by our families, friends and familiar faces. Which means we only take in those who are invited. If you have any questions regarding this don't hesitate to contact us.
photos-question: Can we take photos on a phone or camera
photos-answer: We've hired a photographer to capture this day and will be asking for a fully unplugged ceremony. Please put your electornics on silent and away until cocktail hour.
clothing-answer: April weather in Belgium is highly unpredictable so we recommend to layer up. The official clothing attire is colourful cocktail, meaning we'd love to see you in all kinds of colours. This is a great occasion to pull out your fancy dress or costume! We just kindly ask you to refrain from white, gold and glitter
